title: Rainfall readings overview
text: Rainfall readings represent recent precipitation totals reported per station. Higher rain_mm values indicate heavier rainfall that may increase runoff risk.

title: Water level readings overview
text: Water level readings represent river levels in meters at monitoring stations. Higher river_level_m values indicate elevated water levels that may signal flood risk.

title: Interpreting station data
text: Station-based readings should be interpreted with location context such as district and state. A state summary can be formed by selecting the most relevant stations.
